name: Advent 2022
description:
Advent Calendar 1 Level Everyday (December 1st to 24th)

I wanted to make an Advent Calendar with a new level everyday.

It's a huge amount of work, I'm doing it alone and I still have school so please don't mind if some things aren't the best quality.

Enjoy and have fun :)

Controls
  • Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
  • Space/W/Up - Jump
  • Fullscreen - F11/F
  • Pause - ESC/P
